talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Do not think that you could get away from wasting time with that Blacksmith. Whatever you are doing, please do not embarrass the trinity
(You must obtain the quest from Blacksmith Borin to proceed.)

$Master Cleric Leonard$
I keep hearing Blacksmith Borin's blasted Hounds screeching at all hours. Is torturing them or something, please go and have a look.
(You must obtain the quest from Blacksmith Borin to proceed.)

$Merchant Jenny$
Oh thanks god you're here, I was starting to feel bored
Business is pretty bad these days...and those sorceresses... (She mumbles to herself ominously.)
(You must obtain the quest from Blacksmith Borin to proceed.)

$Blacksmith Borin$
Finally I had integrated the sound you got into the device.
If you operate it properly, it will assist you in finding the Dragon Followers.

$Blacksmith Borin$
First, let's run a test to make sure the device works properly. Take the Lie Detector and ask the residents of Mana Ridge some questions. Better ask some real juicy ones! Hee hee.
<html>$The Lie Detector$</html>

$Blacksmith Borin$
Truths and lies will be signaled by the sound of the Lie Detector. If the person is telling the truth, you will hear a dog. If the person is telling a lie, you will hear a sound of a pig.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
o not think that you could get away from wasting time with that Blacksmith. Whatever you are doing, please do not embarrass the trinity.
(Talk to Blacksmith Borin.)

$Master Cleric Leonard$
keep hearing Blacksmith Borin's blasted Hounds screeching at all hours. Is torturing them or something, please go and have a look.
(Talk to Blacksmith Borin.)

$Merchant Jenny$
Oh thanks god you're here, I was starting to feel bored.
Business is pretty bad these days...and those sorceresses... (She mumbles to herself ominously.)
(Talk to Blacksmith Borin.)

$Blacksmith Borin$
Let's try this!
You may have heard already, but someone told me that Master Cleric Leonard used to rule the alleys of Saint Haven when he was young. Find out if that's true.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I heard you used to rule the alleys of Saint Haven when you were young...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Leonard$
What do you want? You look as thou you want to ask me something?
Well, ask away. I ain't gettin' any younger.

$Master Cleric Leonard$
Hm? Oh, that. Ha! It was ages ago, before I met the former Pontiff Benedict. I used to roam the back alleys of Saint Haven with my gang.
Heh! I must have been seventeen or eighteen. Those were really good times... (Leonard stares off into space wistfully.)

$Master Cleric Leonard$
Oh, yes. At that time, The alleys of Saint Haven were dominated by a thug named Bloody Burt. He was famous for his cruelty and violence. Some even called him the back-alley dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Lie Detector begins squealing like a pig.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Leonard${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
On one rainy night, i challenge him to a duel. With the bless of the Goddess i was fearless back then. I followed him to the Hillside of Foothills of Black Mountain outside Saint Haven, and we fought for days. I emerged the victor after the epic battle.

$Master Cleric Leonard${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
Hey please show some respect when i am reliving my good old glory days
Being the sore loser he was, he and his 17 men jumped on me while i was on the way back. Imagine! 17 vs 1That wouldn't look good, but I took them down one by one. And finally, thanks to me, Bloody Burt was driven out of Saint Haven for good!

$Master Cleric Leonard$
But after meeting Pope Benedict, I decided to let go my pass and answer my calling as a servant of the Goddess.
Now, what made you ask me about that out of nowhere?

$Master Cleric Leonard$
No problem.
Well I got plenty more good stories to share if you want more

$Blacksmith Borin$
What? Hahahaha! Bloody Burt is infamous throughout the world.
But he was always known to work alone. He never had partners. Hahahaha.

$Blacksmith Borin$
If I remember correctly... when he was young, he started something with Bloody Burt, got beaten up, and gathered his own gang and ambushed him to get his own revenge. Tsk Tsk what an coward. Let's move on to our next target shall we?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hmm why not? What do you want to ask her?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Borin$
And what's wrong with that? Hahaha!
Let's pick on... Merchant Jenny next.

$Blacksmith Borin$
It's nothing much. It's just that I heard rumors that she's the only person in Mana Ridge who likes the Sorceresses. Well, y'know, other than the Sorceresses. I think it's up to us to find out if that's true or not.
As a merchant, this information could be important!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So...yeah. You get along with the sorceresses okay?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
(From the moment you get near Merchant Jenny, the Lie Detector starts squealing like mad.)
Oh! Isn't it my good friend, the handsome cleric! Hello and welcome. I'm sorry hope you don't mind the mess, i was having a a little disagreement with one of my sorceress friend. Hee..

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're a big fan of sorceresses, then?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
Oh! Hi there my good friend, the Gorgeous Sorceress! Come take a look...I'm always happy to be at your service, my good sorceress friends! Hoho!

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
Oh, yes! Yes indeed! I mean, I know they can be over demanding, at times. But, I'm sure the stresses of being so beautiful and powerful just...made them edgey. I...don't mind.

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
I mean, I don't mind when they scream at me for not having their favorite perfume stocked. Or, or, when Cynthia threw a stone at my head because I refuse give her a discount...no...don't mind, at all!

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
Yep, even though they treat me badly, don't respect me or even hide my keys under a pile of rubbish.
Yep, I just LOVE these SORCERESSES.

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
And I definitely, DEFINITELY haven't dreamed of sneaking into their Trinity one dark, stormy night, tying them all up, and burning the whole place to the ground! Laughing and taunting them as everything they've ever valued in their smug, arrogant lives burns to ashes and blows away in the uncaring winds!
Nope, never wished with all my heart of doing THAT!

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
Hehe.
Yes, I just love everyone and everything here in Mana Ridge!
Especially there is this BOX. It makes WONDERFUL NOISES. What is that device called?

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
Oh...okay. That's fine.
I know I can always trust you.
You're always so nice, selflessly helping me, not just selling me all your junk without ever buying anything...

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Hound_Bark_Attack_a.wav}
(The Lie Detector started to sound non-stop.)
Seems like you are not the same as the rest.
I shall spare you when I unleash my fury against others..

$Merchant Jenny${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
(Merchant Jenny expression revert back to those friendly smiles.)
Hi there! Do take a look at what our store can offer you~! Hoho~

$Blacksmith Borin$
Muahaha~ Like I mentioned, Merchant Jenny has something weird for her endless cheer. My Lie Detector definitely detected it.
But let's test it on one more person! Heh heh heh...
Now, who will be the next victim...

$Blacksmith Borin$
I know! Master Sorceress Cynthia. Everyone knows she have been especially nice to you, but I've heard she secretly feels something for you. Use this to find out what she REALLY thinks of you! Hahaha!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Actually, there's something I need to ask you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Why are you here at this time?
In times of such chaos, you are here wasting your time?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you think of me.. honestly?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
(She stared at you for a long time and reluctantly nod.)
Fine. What's so important that you need to ask?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
(Cynthia's face softens, and she look at you in the eyes. The Lie Detector starts screaming.)
The truth is...I've always have trust in you. I feel that you are our only hope in our time of need.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
You've been so helpful and hardworking in helping everyone out...even the things I request from you...

$Master Sorceress Cynthia${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
I don't really mean to be so vicious to you. It's just...my own interpretation way of trying to help you. I want you to be successful, and to do that, you must be challenged. With that, you can unlock your potential.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
(She smiles at you )
I'm...so glad you are here, in Mana Ridge.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
So, the truth is, no matter how vicious am I to you, I don't know what I'd do without you. Thank you so much for helping out so much.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
I wish you are dead, most of the time.
Now quit wasting my time and DO SOMETHING USEFUL!!

$Blacksmith Borin$
What?
Pu... ha... haha... kwhaha... whahahah... ahahaha!
(Borin falls to the ground, holding his tummy.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I am happy to see that you're happy. Can I go now?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Borin$
HAhahahahahaHAHAHA!
Oh...oh...heeheehee...oh!
Oh...you are trying to make me laugh to death! Hahaha...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Yes, I'm impressed ... I admire you. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Borin$
I'm a little old man that had so much fun here. I guess those three confirmed that the Lie Detector is working the way it's suppose to be. What do you think? I'm simply amazing, ain't I? Yes, yes, i know i am a real genius.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I do not know. But I think it's malfunctioning ... </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Borin${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
(The Lie Detector starts screaming...at you!)
What is this? What do you mean by this?!

$Blacksmith Borin$
Malfunctioning? That's not even possible! My Lie Detector, the latest technology, cannot possibly be malfunctioning! What a joke!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well.. How many brothers do you have?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Borin$
Alright then, ask me something.
I must confirm with my own eyes that my invention works properly.

$Blacksmith Borin${sound:Hound_Bark_Attack_a.wav}
What? Even I don't know that...
Since each town and city has one of my brothers, I guess we could count the number of settlements...

$Blacksmith Borin$
That's nonsense! Ask a proper question to do a definitive test.

$Blacksmith Borin${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
What kind of question is that?! I have lots of girlfriends! Are you really asking that question?
(With the sound of the Lie Detector starts to shake vigorously.)
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Blacksmith Borin${sound:Orc_Dead_a.wav}
...
...
Hand it over, I guess it's really spoiled..

journal.title: Talk to Blacksmith Borin
journal.contents:
Blacksmith Borin has given you his Lie Detector, now complete with sound effects, and requests that you test it on the unsuspecting citizens of Mana Ridge.

Mana Ridge → Blacksmith Borin

journal.title: Talk to Master Cleric Leonard
journal.contents:
Blacksmith Borin asked you to use the Lie Detector to find out if Master Cleric Leonard really was a street hood in Saint Haven during his youth.

Mana Ridge → Master Cleric Leonard

journal.title: Talk to Blacksmith Borin
journal.contents:
Report the results of the Lie Detector with Master Cleric Leonard to Blacksmith Borin.

Mana Ridge → Blacksmith Borin

journal.title: Talk to Merchant Jenny
journal.contents:
Blacksmith Borin wants you to use the Lie Detector with Merchant Jenny, who is famous for her tolerance of Sorceresses. Find out the truth.

Mana Ridge → Merchant Jenny

journal.title: Talk to Blacksmith Borin
journal.contents:
Report the results of testing the Lie Detector with Merchant Jenny to Blacksmith Borin.

Mana Ridge → Blacksmith Borin

journal.title: Talk to Master Sorceress Cynthia
journal.contents:
As the final quality test of the Lie Detector, Blacksmith Borin wants to find out what Master Sorceress Cynthia really thinks of you.

Mana Ridge → Master Sorceress Cynthia

journal.title: Talk to Blacksmith Borin
journal.contents:
Report the results of testing the Lie Detector with Master Sorceress Cynthia to Blacksmith Borin.

Mana Ridge → Blacksmith Borin
